EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Call Summary (1379358641.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Call Summary (1379358641.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Peg, This looks perfect – thanks so much! I noticed you had started the online enrollment but have not quite finished. Please log in and complete the online enrollment when you can. I also need you to log in to MBO Access <https://access.mbopartners.com/> and complete the “Industry Expertise” and “Disciplines” sections of your profile. This information needed for our workmen’s comp. policy and must be completed before I can activate your account and get you billing. Your user ID and password is the same as your MBO Business Center. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Don and Peggy Johnson [mailto:donandpeggy2011@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, September 12, 2013 9:51 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Call Summary Hi Sara, Attached is the I9 form and a picture of my passport. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns. We plan to be out of town for a few days, but I will send out the MBO email to Honeywell some time next week. I also will work on my profile. Thanks for everything. I'll be in touch! Regards, Peg Peggy Johnson231-838-1596 On Fri, Aug 23, 2013 at 11:29 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Dear Peggy, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful: - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - We have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - You can review our “Independent’s Guide” by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> - You can join MBO’s LinkedIn in group by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=71161&mostPopular=&trk=tyah&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - I have attached the net cash estimates we created on the phone, please give me a quick ring to review when you have a moment. - Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke about over the phone by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> (Please bookmark this page.) I will follow up with you, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> Best,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
